pr_title: feat: Add description column to DEG & INDG

timeline.message: feat: Add description column to DEG & INDG

timeline.bodyText:
Remember to register the Flyway migration here:
https://github.com/dhis2/wow-backend/blob/master/coordination/flyway_versioning.md
The integration tests now fail with:
Caused by: org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanCreationException: Error creating bean with name 'flyway' defined in class path resource [org/hisp/dhis/db/migration/config/FlywayConfig.class]: Invocation of init method failed; nested exception is org.flywaydb.core.api.FlywayException: Found more than one migration with version 2.35.13
timeline.author: larshelge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
+alter table dataelementgroup add column if not exists "description" text;

timeline.message: Fix: update flyway migration version number

timeline.bodyText: Use spaces instead of tabs here.
timeline.author: larshelge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,8 @@
 
     <property name="name" column="name" not-null="true" unique="false" length="230" />
 
+	<property name="description" type="text" />

timeline.bodyText: Use spaces instead of tabs here.
timeline.author: larshelge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,8 @@
 
     <property name="shortName" column="shortname" unique="true" length="50" />
 
+	<property name="description" type="text" />

timeline.bodyText: Use spaces instead of tabs here.
timeline.author: larshelge
